skillTree.localised_description: The mighty weapon of Brokk Ironpick, Earthburner is inscribed with a Rune of Fire and a Rune of Cleaving.

effects.description: Passive ability: "Earthburner"
Bonus vs Large: +10
Armour-piercing weapon damage: +20
Attribute: Causes Terror

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.

effects.description:

skillTree.localised_description: The Armour of Hearth was forged by Karak Norn's Master Runesmith. It is inscribed with a Rune of Preservation, a Master Rune of Gromril, and a Rune of Furnace.

effects.description: Passive ability: "Armour of Hearth"
Armour: +10
Ward save: 10%
Wound recovery time: -2

skillTree.localised_description: After Bugman's Brewery was attacked by Git Guzzler, Karak Norn and Brokk Ironpick swore to protect it. This flame-colored tankard was made by the Brewmasters of Karak Norn in memory of that commitment.

effects.description:

skillTree.localised_description: All Dwarfs are stubborn, but none more so than Grudgebearer, the founder of the Age of Reckoning.

effects.description: Leadership: +9

skillTree.localised_description: The endless courage of the Warrior God, directed to bolster this Dawi’s own reserves.

effects.description: Missile resistance: 10%

skillTree.localised_description: To fire the forges and bring true craft and artifice back into the world.

effects.description:
Oathgold from buildings: +10%

skillTree.localised_description: A true Lord knows the Underway, his Dwarfhold and how to fight under the ground better than anyone.

skillTree.localised_description: This Lord belts out orders and can be heard even across a battlefield smothered in the grim noise of war.

skillTree.localised_description: This stubborn Dwarf refuses to yield or tire, and ensures his followers are of the same ilk.

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

skillTree.localised_description: Full-Plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.

effects.description: Armour: +6

skillTree.localised_description: Dwarfs are resolute - once they commit to charging the foe, they put all their strength behind that initial blow.

effects.description: Charge bonus: +15
Charge bonus: +30

skillTree.localised_description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

effects.description: Melee defence: +6
Melee defence: +12

skillTree.localised_description: The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.

effects.description: Hit points: +7%
Hit points: +15%

skillTree.localised_description: All Dwarfs despise the Greenskins, for the urki and grobi are the prime agents in the Times of Woe.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +5%
Weapon strength: +7% when fighting against Greenskins
Weapon strength: +8%
Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Greenskins

skillTree.localised_description: From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.

effects.description: Ability: "Foe-Seeker"

skillTree.localised_description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10%
Weapon strength: +20%

skillTree.localised_description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.

effects.description: Melee attack: +6
Melee attack: +12

skillTree.localised_description: A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.

effects.description: Melee defence: +6
Melee defence: +12

skillTree.localised_description: Dwarfs are not fast, yet they will soldier on, always moving despite any hazards encountered.

effects.description: Speed: +7%
Speed: +15%

skillTree.localised_description: The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

effects.description: Ability: "Deadly Onslaught"

skillTree.localised_name: Defender of the Western Karak Ankor
skillTree.localised_description: The Grey Mountains Dwarfs have long been known for their toughness and indestructible defenses.

skillTree.localised_description: Due to the rugged terrain of the Grey Mountains, the Dwarfs of Karak Norn often use the Underway to move, which makes them masters of underground battle.

skillTree.localised_description: Of all the areas settled by the Dwarfs, the Grey Mountains are the poorest in minerals. Nevertheless, the lack of resources cannot shake the will and determination of the Dwarfs settled in the Grey Mountains.

skillTree.localised_description: Thungni is the Dwarf God of Runesmiths. Many years ago, Alaric the Mad built a mighty runeforge in the Grey Mountains, and the power of runic magic has brought countless victories to Karak Norn's army.

This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Brokk Ironpick is the King of Karak Norn, one of the poorest Dwarf Holds on the outskirts of the Karaz Ankor.  Dwarfs of this region often seek fortune and adventure outside the Hold, and are known to form alliances with men of The Empire and Brettonia.
